SEARCH
Package cybooks.service

Class LoanService

java.lang.Object
cybooks.service.LoanService
public class LoanService extends Object
Service class for managing loans in the library system.

    • addLoan

      public void addLoan(int userId, String bookIsbn)
      Add a loan.
      Parameters:
      userId - The user who borrowed the book.
      bookIsbn - The book that was borrowed.

    • getUserLoanCount

      public int getUserLoanCount(int userId)
      Get the number of loans for a given user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The user whose loans to count.
      Returns:
      The number of loans for the given user.

    • getLoan

      public Loan getLoan(int id)
      Get a loan by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The loan's ID.
      Returns:
      The loan with the given ID, or null if no such loan exists.

    • returnLoan

      public void returnLoan(int userId, String bookIsbn)
      Return a loan.
      Parameters:
      userId - The user who borrowed the book.
      bookIsbn - The book that was borrowed.

    • getLoansForUser

      public ArrayList<Loan> getLoansForUser(User user)
      Get all loans for a given user.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose loans to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A list of all loans for the given user.

    • getLoansForBook

      public ArrayList<Loan> getLoansForBook(String bookIsbn)
      Get all loans for a given book id.
      Parameters:
      bookIsbn - The book id whose loans to retrieve. The book id is the id of the book that was borrowed.

    • getCurrentLoans

      public ArrayList<Loan> getCurrentLoans()

    • checkBookIsBorrowed

      public boolean checkBookIsBorrowed(String bookIsbn)
      Check if a book is borrowed.
      Parameters:
      bookIsbn - The book to check.
      Returns:
